results.title: Oral bullous eruption after taking lisinopril--case report and literature review.

results.title: Lymphomatoid drug eruption mimicking digitate dermatosis: cross reactivity between two drugs that suppress angiotensin II function.
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Eruptions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003875 @@@eruption@@@ cleared completely after discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor).
